edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.structureBuildingCodelets
Class SBCodeletFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.structureBuildingCodelets.SBCodeletFactory

public class SBCodeletFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The CodeletFactory is responsible for loading codelets dynamically. There are also methods which will automatically add the new codelets to a scheduler. This factory also recycles codelets to save creation time. Pattern: Factory, Singleton
